programme.title: Events of 1991
programme.short_synopsis: A review of the major news stories of 1991 by Alistair Cooke.
programme.medium_synopsis: Following a recent opinion poll on the significance of the major events of 1991, Alistair Cooke looks back on the previous year and examines the top American choices on the list.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
